description: This file sets up an Express server that manages multiple database connections (PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite, MongoDB), loads environment variables from .env files, and provides API endpoints for database operations like listing tables and retrieving data. It also includes a static file server and security headers.

classes.name: DatabaseAdapter
classes.description: Base class for database adapters providing common interface for testing connection, retrieving tables, and data.

classes.name: SQLAdapter
classes.description: Abstract class extending DatabaseAdapter for SQL-based databases, implementing execute logic.

classes.name: PostgresAdapter
classes.description: Adapter class for PostgreSQL database operations.

classes.name: MySQLAdapter
classes.description: Adapter class for MySQL database operations.

classes.name: SQLiteAdapter
classes.description: Adapter class for SQLite database operations.

classes.name: MongoDBAdapter
classes.description: Adapter class for MongoDB database operations.

methods.name: loadEnvFiles
methods.description: Loads environment variables from database-specific .env files.

methods.name: handleApiRequest
methods.description: Handles API requests generically for various database operations.
